sentence.text: These results suggest (i) apparent allelic heterogeneity in complement activation and genetic heterogeneity in thiamine pyrophosphate transmembrane transport across different ethnic groups; (ii) shared ulcerative colitis genetic etiological factors among Asians; and finally (iii) re-exploration of GWAS findings together with high-density genotyping/sequencing and trans-ethnic fine mapping approaches may help identify shared and population-specific risk variants and enable to explain missing disease heritability
